Articles.Content:
Hello there!

Today I came up with the idea of building a flying Kristmas Tree so that my Kerbals can celebrate Christmas, too. First of all, I wish you and your families Merry Christmas

The video itself isn't really good. It's my first one on that channel. Feel free to leave suggestions and write me what you think! Have fun!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lgh9fxowQUo
